summary: (Mandarin with English subtitles) Blending modern techno music with traditional Buddhist ceremonial dance on the big screen, The Spin Kid is one young man's redemptive journey from alleyway punk to dance floor pioneer.
cast: Blue Cheng-Lung Lan|Nikki Hsieh|Tai-Bo|Christopher Ni|Ching-Ting Hsia|Keri Liu|Jack Kao|Tien-Lun Yeh|Tai Chung Chen|Rainy Kuo|Charles Sun
title: Dian Na Ch√†
